title: Simulation-Based Integrated Curriculum for Accounting Beginners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics (sufficient to understand fundamental financial statement structures)
context.additional_context: Team-based project emphasis through VR simulation environments accessible via personal devices

learning_goals: Through VR simulation, learners will explain the interrelationships of assets, liabilities, and equity in creating financial statements for a virtual company.
Through storytelling-based case analysis, learners can present at least three ways accounting information impacts managerial decision-making.
Learners can evaluate the social responsibility aspects of accounting practices by analyzing compliance with legal regulations and prepare a report.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
